content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI used the command "browse_website" to search for contact information for Instituto Hemingway. However, the website did not provide any contact information. Links were not found either. Previously, I used the command "google" and received links to various websites including GoAbroad and GoOverseas. Command google returned links to multiple websites including Instituto Hemingway\'s website and reviews on GoOverseas and GoAbroad.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "send_tweet.py"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "analyze_code", "args": {"code": "import tweepy\\n\\n# Load Twitter API credentials\\nwith open(\'.twitter_keys\', \'r\') as f:\\n    keys = f.read().splitlines()\\n    consumer_key = keys[0]\\n    consumer_secret = keys[1]\\n    access_token = keys[2]\\n    access_token_secret = keys[3]\\n\\n# Authenticate API credentials\\nauth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)\\nauth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)\\n\\n# Create API object\\napi = tweepy.API(auth)\\n\\n# Send tweet\\ntweet_text = \\"@InstitutoHemingway Hi, I\'m interested in learning more about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers. Can you provide more information?\\"\\napi.update_status(tweet_text)\\nprint(\'Tweet sent successfully!\')"}}}'}]
"""
